00026 /*
00027  * Copyright (c) 2009, 2010, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
00028  * Use is subject to license terms.

00032 /*
00033  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00034  * Lustre is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00035  *
00036  * libcfs/libcfs/hash.c
00037  *
00038  * Implement a hash class for hash process in lustre system.
00039  *
00040  * Author: YuZhangyong <yzy@clusterfs.com>
00041  *
00042  * 2008-08-15: Brian Behlendorf <behlendorf1@llnl.gov>
00043  * - Simplified API and improved documentation
00044  * - Added per-hash feature flags:
00045  *   * CFS_HASH_DEBUG additional validation
00046  *   * CFS_HASH_REHASH dynamic rehashing
00047  * - Added per-hash statistics
00048  * - General performance enhancements
00049  *
00050  * 2009-07-31: Liang Zhen <zhen.liang@sun.com>
00051  * - move all stuff to libcfs
00052  * - don't allow cur_bits != max_bits without setting of CFS_HASH_REHASH
00053  * - ignore hs_rwlock if without CFS_HASH_REHASH setting
00054  * - buckets are allocated one by one(instead of contiguous memory),
00055  *   to avoid unnecessary cacheline conflict
00056  *
00057  * 2010-03-01: Liang Zhen <zhen.liang@sun.com>
00058  * - "bucket" is a group of hlist_head now, user can specify bucket size
00059  *   by bkt_bits of cfs_hash_create(), all hlist_heads in a bucket share
00060  *   one lock for reducing memory overhead.
00061  *
00062  * - support lockless hash, caller will take care of locks:
00063  *   avoid lock overhead for hash tables that are already protected
00064  *   by locking in the caller for another reason
00065  *
00066  * - support both spin_lock/rwlock for bucket:
00067  *   overhead of spinlock contention is lower than read/write
00068  *   contention of rwlock, so using spinlock to serialize operations on
00069  *   bucket is more reasonable for those frequently changed hash tables
00070  *
00071  * - support one-single lock mode:
00072  *   one lock to protect all hash operations to avoid overhead of
00073  *   multiple locks if hash table is always small
00074  *
00075  * - removed a lot of unnecessary addref & decref on hash element:
00076  *   addref & decref are atomic operations in many use-cases which
00077  *   are expensive.
00078  *
00079  * - support non-blocking cfs_hash_add() and cfs_hash_findadd():
00080  *   some lustre use-cases require these functions to be strictly
00081  *   non-blocking, we need to schedule required rehash on a different
00082  *   thread on those cases.
00083  *
00084  * - safer rehash on large hash table
00085  *   In old implementation, rehash function will exclusively lock the
00086  *   hash table and finish rehash in one batch, it's dangerous on SMP
00087  *   system because rehash millions of elements could take long time.
00088  *   New implemented rehash can release lock and relax CPU in middle
00089  *   of rehash, it's safe for another thread to search/change on the
00090  *   hash table even it's in rehasing.
00091  *
00092  * - support two different refcount modes
00093  *   . hash table has refcount on element
00094  *   . hash table doesn't change refcount on adding/removing element
00095  *
00096  * - support long name hash table (for param-tree)
00097  *
00098  * - fix a bug for cfs_hash_rehash_key:
00099  *   in old implementation, cfs_hash_rehash_key could screw up the
00100  *   hash-table because @key is overwritten without any protection.
00101  *   Now we need user to define hs_keycpy for those rehash enabled
00102  *   hash tables, cfs_hash_rehash_key will overwrite hash-key
00103  *   inside lock by calling hs_keycpy.
00104  *
00105  * - better hash iteration:
00106  *   Now we support both locked iteration & lockless iteration of hash
00107  *   table. Also, user can break the iteration by return 1 in callback.
00108  */
00109 #include <linux/seq_file.h>
00110 
00111 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00112 
00113 #if CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL >= CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1
00114 static unsigned int warn_on_depth = 8;
00115 module_param(warn_on_depth, uint, 0644);
00116 MODULE_PARM_DESC(warn_on_depth, "warning when hash depth is high.");
00117 #endif

00119 struct cfs_wi_sched *cfs_sched_rehash;

00121 static inline void
00122 cfs_hash_nl_lock(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive) {}
00123 
00124 static inline void
00125 cfs_hash_nl_unlock(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive) {}
00126 
00127 static inline void
00128 cfs_hash_spin_lock(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive)
00129         __acquires(&lock->spin)
00130 {
00131         spin_lock(&lock->spin);
00132 }
00133 
00134 static inline void
00135 cfs_hash_spin_unlock(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive)
00136         __releases(&lock->spin)
00137 {
00138         spin_unlock(&lock->spin);
00139 }
00140 
00141 static inline void
00142 cfs_hash_rw_lock(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive)
00143         __acquires(&lock->rw)
00144 {
00145         if (!exclusive)
00146                 read_lock(&lock->rw);
00147         else
00148                 write_lock(&lock->rw);
00149 }
00150 
00151 static inline void
00152 cfs_hash_rw_unlock(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive)
00153         __releases(&lock->rw)
00154 {
00155         if (!exclusive)
00156                 read_unlock(&lock->rw);
00157         else
00158                 write_unlock(&lock->rw);
00159 }
00160 
00162 static struct cfs_hash_lock_ops cfs_hash_nl_lops = {
00163         .hs_lock        = cfs_hash_nl_lock,
00164         .hs_unlock      = cfs_hash_nl_unlock,
00165         .hs_bkt_lock    = cfs_hash_nl_lock,
00166         .hs_bkt_unlock  = cfs_hash_nl_unlock,
00167 };
00168 
00170 static struct cfs_hash_lock_ops cfs_hash_nbl_lops = {
00171         .hs_lock        = cfs_hash_spin_lock,
00172         .hs_unlock      = cfs_hash_spin_unlock,
00173         .hs_bkt_lock    = cfs_hash_nl_lock,
00174         .hs_bkt_unlock  = cfs_hash_nl_unlock,
00175 };
00176 
00178 static struct cfs_hash_lock_ops cfs_hash_bkt_spin_lops = {
00179         .hs_lock        = cfs_hash_rw_lock,
00180         .hs_unlock      = cfs_hash_rw_unlock,
00181         .hs_bkt_lock    = cfs_hash_spin_lock,
00182         .hs_bkt_unlock  = cfs_hash_spin_unlock,
00183 };
00184 
00186 static struct cfs_hash_lock_ops cfs_hash_bkt_rw_lops = {
00187         .hs_lock        = cfs_hash_rw_lock,
00188         .hs_unlock      = cfs_hash_rw_unlock,
00189         .hs_bkt_lock    = cfs_hash_rw_lock,
00190         .hs_bkt_unlock  = cfs_hash_rw_unlock,
00191 };
00192 
00194 static struct cfs_hash_lock_ops cfs_hash_nr_bkt_spin_lops = {
00195         .hs_lock        = cfs_hash_nl_lock,
00196         .hs_unlock      = cfs_hash_nl_unlock,
00197         .hs_bkt_lock    = cfs_hash_spin_lock,
00198         .hs_bkt_unlock  = cfs_hash_spin_unlock,
00199 };
00200 
00202 static struct cfs_hash_lock_ops cfs_hash_nr_bkt_rw_lops = {
00203         .hs_lock        = cfs_hash_nl_lock,
00204         .hs_unlock      = cfs_hash_nl_unlock,
00205         .hs_bkt_lock    = cfs_hash_rw_lock,
00206         .hs_bkt_unlock  = cfs_hash_rw_unlock,
00207 };
00208 
00209 static void
00210 cfs_hash_lock_setup(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00211 {
00212         if (cfs_hash_with_no_lock(hs)) {
00213                 hs->hs_lops = &cfs_hash_nl_lops;
00214 
00215         } else if (cfs_hash_with_no_bktlock(hs)) {
00216                 hs->hs_lops = &cfs_hash_nbl_lops;
00217                 spin_lock_init(&hs->hs_lock.spin);
00218 
00219         } else if (cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs)) {
00220                 rwlock_init(&hs->hs_lock.rw);
00221 
00222                 if (cfs_hash_with_rw_bktlock(hs))
00223                         hs->hs_lops = &cfs_hash_bkt_rw_lops;
00224                 else if (cfs_hash_with_spin_bktlock(hs))
00225                         hs->hs_lops = &cfs_hash_bkt_spin_lops;
00226                 else
00227                         LBUG();
00228         } else {
00229                 if (cfs_hash_with_rw_bktlock(hs))
00230                         hs->hs_lops = &cfs_hash_nr_bkt_rw_lops;
00231                 else if (cfs_hash_with_spin_bktlock(hs))
00232                         hs->hs_lops = &cfs_hash_nr_bkt_spin_lops;
00233                 else
00234                         LBUG();
00235         }
00236 }

00242 struct cfs_hash_head {
00243         struct hlist_head       hh_head;        
00244 };
00245 
00246 static int
00247 cfs_hash_hh_hhead_size(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00248 {
00249         return sizeof(struct cfs_hash_head);
00250 }
00251 
00252 static struct hlist_head *
00253 cfs_hash_hh_hhead(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00254 {
00255         struct cfs_hash_head *head;
00256 
00257         head = (struct cfs_hash_head *)&bd->bd_bucket->hsb_head[0];
00258         return &head[bd->bd_offset].hh_head;
00259 }
00260 
00261 static int
00262 cfs_hash_hh_hnode_add(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00263                       struct hlist_node *hnode)
00264 {
00265         hlist_add_head(hnode, cfs_hash_hh_hhead(hs, bd));
00266         return -1; /* unknown depth */
00267 }
00268 
00269 static int
00270 cfs_hash_hh_hnode_del(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00271                       struct hlist_node *hnode)
00272 {
00273         hlist_del_init(hnode);
00274         return -1; /* unknown depth */
00275 }

00281 struct cfs_hash_head_dep {
00282         struct hlist_head       hd_head;        
00283         unsigned int            hd_depth;       
00284 };
00285 
00286 static int
00287 cfs_hash_hd_hhead_size(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00288 {
00289         return sizeof(struct cfs_hash_head_dep);
00290 }
00291 
00292 static struct hlist_head *
00293 cfs_hash_hd_hhead(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00294 {
00295         struct cfs_hash_head_dep   *head;
00296 
00297         head = (struct cfs_hash_head_dep *)&bd->bd_bucket->hsb_head[0];
00298         return &head[bd->bd_offset].hd_head;
00299 }
00300 
00301 static int
00302 cfs_hash_hd_hnode_add(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00303                       struct hlist_node *hnode)
00304 {
00305         struct cfs_hash_head_dep *hh;
00306 
00307         hh = container_of(cfs_hash_hd_hhead(hs, bd),
00308                           struct cfs_hash_head_dep, hd_head);
00309         hlist_add_head(hnode, &hh->hd_head);
00310         return ++hh->hd_depth;
00311 }
00312 
00313 static int
00314 cfs_hash_hd_hnode_del(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00315                       struct hlist_node *hnode)
00316 {
00317         struct cfs_hash_head_dep *hh;
00318 
00319         hh = container_of(cfs_hash_hd_hhead(hs, bd),
00320                           struct cfs_hash_head_dep, hd_head);
00321         hlist_del_init(hnode);
00322         return --hh->hd_depth;
00323 }
00324 
00329 struct cfs_hash_dhead {
00330         struct hlist_head       dh_head;        
00331         struct hlist_node       *dh_tail;       
00332 };
00333 
00334 static int
00335 cfs_hash_dh_hhead_size(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00336 {
00337         return sizeof(struct cfs_hash_dhead);
00338 }
00339 
00340 static struct hlist_head *
00341 cfs_hash_dh_hhead(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00342 {
00343         struct cfs_hash_dhead *head;
00344 
00345         head = (struct cfs_hash_dhead *)&bd->bd_bucket->hsb_head[0];
00346         return &head[bd->bd_offset].dh_head;
00347 }
00348 
00349 static int
00350 cfs_hash_dh_hnode_add(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00351                       struct hlist_node *hnode)
00352 {
00353         struct cfs_hash_dhead *dh;
00354 
00355         dh = container_of(cfs_hash_dh_hhead(hs, bd),
00356                           struct cfs_hash_dhead, dh_head);
00357         if (dh->dh_tail != NULL) /* not empty */
00358                 hlist_add_behind(hnode, dh->dh_tail);
00359         else /* empty list */
00360                 hlist_add_head(hnode, &dh->dh_head);
00361         dh->dh_tail = hnode;
00362         return -1; /* unknown depth */
00363 }
00364 
00365 static int
00366 cfs_hash_dh_hnode_del(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00367                       struct hlist_node *hnd)
00368 {
00369         struct cfs_hash_dhead *dh;
00370 
00371         dh = container_of(cfs_hash_dh_hhead(hs, bd),
00372                           struct cfs_hash_dhead, dh_head);
00373         if (hnd->next == NULL) { /* it's the tail */
00374                 dh->dh_tail = (hnd->pprev == &dh->dh_head.first) ? NULL :
00375                               container_of(hnd->pprev, struct hlist_node, next);
00376         }
00377         hlist_del_init(hnd);
00378         return -1; /* unknown depth */
00379 }
00380

00387         struct hlist_node       *dd_tail;       
00388         unsigned int            dd_depth;       
00389 };

00393 {
00394         return sizeof(struct cfs_hash_dhead_dep);
00395 }

00397 static struct hlist_head *
00398 cfs_hash_dd_hhead(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00399 {
00400         struct cfs_hash_dhead_dep *head;
00401 
00402         head = (struct cfs_hash_dhead_dep *)&bd->bd_bucket->hsb_head[0];
00403         return &head[bd->bd_offset].dd_head;
00404 }
00405 
00406 static int
00407 cfs_hash_dd_hnode_add(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00408                       struct hlist_node *hnode)
00409 {
00410         struct cfs_hash_dhead_dep *dh;
00411 
00412         dh = container_of(cfs_hash_dd_hhead(hs, bd),
00413                           struct cfs_hash_dhead_dep, dd_head);
00414         if (dh->dd_tail != NULL) /* not empty */
00415                 hlist_add_behind(hnode, dh->dd_tail);
00416         else /* empty list */
00417                 hlist_add_head(hnode, &dh->dd_head);
00418         dh->dd_tail = hnode;
00419         return ++dh->dd_depth;
00420 }
00421 
00422 static int
00423 cfs_hash_dd_hnode_del(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00424                       struct hlist_node *hnd)
00425 {
00426         struct cfs_hash_dhead_dep *dh;
00427 
00428         dh = container_of(cfs_hash_dd_hhead(hs, bd),
00429                           struct cfs_hash_dhead_dep, dd_head);
00430         if (hnd->next == NULL) { /* it's the tail */
00431                 dh->dd_tail = (hnd->pprev == &dh->dd_head.first) ? NULL :
00432                               container_of(hnd->pprev, struct hlist_node, next);
00433         }
00434         hlist_del_init(hnd);
00435         return --dh->dd_depth;
00436 }

00438 static struct cfs_hash_hlist_ops cfs_hash_hh_hops = {
00439        .hop_hhead      = cfs_hash_hh_hhead,
00440        .hop_hhead_size = cfs_hash_hh_hhead_size,
00441        .hop_hnode_add  = cfs_hash_hh_hnode_add,
00442        .hop_hnode_del  = cfs_hash_hh_hnode_del,
00443 };
00444 
00445 static struct cfs_hash_hlist_ops cfs_hash_hd_hops = {
00446        .hop_hhead      = cfs_hash_hd_hhead,
00447        .hop_hhead_size = cfs_hash_hd_hhead_size,
00448        .hop_hnode_add  = cfs_hash_hd_hnode_add,
00449        .hop_hnode_del  = cfs_hash_hd_hnode_del,
00450 };
00451 
00452 static struct cfs_hash_hlist_ops cfs_hash_dh_hops = {
00453        .hop_hhead      = cfs_hash_dh_hhead,
00454        .hop_hhead_size = cfs_hash_dh_hhead_size,
00455        .hop_hnode_add  = cfs_hash_dh_hnode_add,
00456        .hop_hnode_del  = cfs_hash_dh_hnode_del,

00459 static struct cfs_hash_hlist_ops cfs_hash_dd_hops = {
00460        .hop_hhead      = cfs_hash_dd_hhead,
00461        .hop_hhead_size = cfs_hash_dd_hhead_size,
00462        .hop_hnode_add  = cfs_hash_dd_hnode_add,
00463        .hop_hnode_del  = cfs_hash_dd_hnode_del,
00464 };
00465 
00466 static void
00467 cfs_hash_hlist_setup(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00468 {
00469         if (cfs_hash_with_add_tail(hs)) {
00470                 hs->hs_hops = cfs_hash_with_depth(hs) ?
00471                               &cfs_hash_dd_hops : &cfs_hash_dh_hops;
00472         } else {
00473                 hs->hs_hops = cfs_hash_with_depth(hs) ?
00474                               &cfs_hash_hd_hops : &cfs_hash_hh_hops;
00475         }
00476 }
00477 
00478 static void
00479 cfs_hash_bd_from_key(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bucket **bkts,
00480                      unsigned int bits, const void *key, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00481 {
00482         unsigned int index = cfs_hash_id(hs, key, (1U << bits) - 1);
00483 
00484         LASSERT(bits == hs->hs_cur_bits || bits == hs->hs_rehash_bits);
00485 
00486         bd->bd_bucket = bkts[index & ((1U << (bits - hs->hs_bkt_bits)) - 1)];
00487         bd->bd_offset = index >> (bits - hs->hs_bkt_bits);
00488 }
00489 
00490 void
00491 cfs_hash_bd_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00492 {
00493         /* NB: caller should hold hs->hs_rwlock if REHASH is set */
00494         if (likely(hs->hs_rehash_buckets == NULL)) {
00495                 cfs_hash_bd_from_key(hs, hs->hs_buckets,
00496                                      hs->hs_cur_bits, key, bd);
00497         } else {
00498                 LASSERT(hs->hs_rehash_bits != 0);
00499                 cfs_hash_bd_from_key(hs, hs->hs_rehash_buckets,
00500                                      hs->hs_rehash_bits, key, bd);
00501         }
00502 }
00503 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_bd_get);
00504 
00505 static inline void
00506 cfs_hash_bd_dep_record(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd, int dep_cur)
00507 {
00508         if (likely(dep_cur <= bd->bd_bucket->hsb_depmax))
00509                 return;
00510 
00511         bd->bd_bucket->hsb_depmax = dep_cur;
00512 # if CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL >= CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1
00513         if (likely(warn_on_depth == 0 ||
00514                    max(warn_on_depth, hs->hs_dep_max) >= dep_cur))
00515                 return;
00516 
00517         spin_lock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00518         hs->hs_dep_max  = dep_cur;
00519         hs->hs_dep_bkt  = bd->bd_bucket->hsb_index;
00520         hs->hs_dep_off  = bd->bd_offset;
00521         hs->hs_dep_bits = hs->hs_cur_bits;
00522         spin_unlock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00523 
00524         cfs_wi_schedule(cfs_sched_rehash, &hs->hs_dep_wi);
00525 # endif
00526 }
00527 
00528 void
00529 cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00530                         struct hlist_node *hnode)
00531 {
00532         int rc;
00533 
00534         rc = hs->hs_hops->hop_hnode_add(hs, bd, hnode);
00535         cfs_hash_bd_dep_record(hs, bd, rc);
00536         bd->bd_bucket->hsb_version++;
00537         if (unlikely(bd->bd_bucket->hsb_version == 0))
00538                 bd->bd_bucket->hsb_version++;
00539         bd->bd_bucket->hsb_count++;
00540 
00541         if (cfs_hash_with_counter(hs))
00542                 atomic_inc(&hs->hs_count);
00543         if (!cfs_hash_with_no_itemref(hs))
00544                 cfs_hash_get(hs, hnode);
00545 }
00546 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_bd_add_locked);
00547 
00548 void
00549 cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00550                        struct hlist_node *hnode)
00551 {
00552         hs->hs_hops->hop_hnode_del(hs, bd, hnode);
00553 
00554         LASSERT(bd->bd_bucket->hsb_count > 0);
00555         bd->bd_bucket->hsb_count--;
00556         bd->bd_bucket->hsb_version++;
00557         if (unlikely(bd->bd_bucket->hsb_version == 0))
00558                 bd->bd_bucket->hsb_version++;
00559 
00560         if (cfs_hash_with_counter(hs)) {
00561                 LASSERT(atomic_read(&hs->hs_count) > 0);
00562                 atomic_dec(&hs->hs_count);
00563         }
00564         if (!cfs_hash_with_no_itemref(hs))
00565                 cfs_hash_put_locked(hs, hnode);
00566 }
00567 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_bd_del_locked);
00568 
00569 void
00570 cfs_hash_bd_move_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd_old,
00571                         struct cfs_hash_bd *bd_new, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00572 {
00573         struct cfs_hash_bucket *obkt = bd_old->bd_bucket;
00574         struct cfs_hash_bucket *nbkt = bd_new->bd_bucket;
00575         int                rc;
00576 
00577         if (cfs_hash_bd_compare(bd_old, bd_new) == 0)
00578                 return;
00579 
00580         /* use cfs_hash_bd_hnode_add/del, to avoid atomic & refcount ops
00581          * in cfs_hash_bd_del/add_locked */
00582         hs->hs_hops->hop_hnode_del(hs, bd_old, hnode);
00583         rc = hs->hs_hops->hop_hnode_add(hs, bd_new, hnode);
00584         cfs_hash_bd_dep_record(hs, bd_new, rc);
00585 
00586         LASSERT(obkt->hsb_count > 0);
00587         obkt->hsb_count--;
00588         obkt->hsb_version++;
00589         if (unlikely(obkt->hsb_version == 0))
00590                 obkt->hsb_version++;
00591         nbkt->hsb_count++;
00592         nbkt->hsb_version++;
00593         if (unlikely(nbkt->hsb_version == 0))
00594                 nbkt->hsb_version++;
00595 }
00596 
00597 enum {
00599         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_FIND     = 1 << 0,
00601         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_REF      = 1 << 1,
00603         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_ADD      = 1 << 2,
00605         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_DEL      = 1 << 3,
00606 };
00607 
00608 enum cfs_hash_lookup_intent {
00610         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_PEEK       = CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_FIND,
00612         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_FIND       = (CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_FIND |
00613                                        CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_REF),
00615         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_ADD        = (CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_FIND |
00616                                        CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_ADD),
00618         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_FINDADD    = (CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_FIND |
00619                                        CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_ADD),
00621         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_FINDDEL    = (CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_FIND |
00622                                        CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_DEL)
00623 };
00624 
00625 static struct hlist_node *
00626 cfs_hash_bd_lookup_intent(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00627                           const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode,
00628                           enum cfs_hash_lookup_intent intent)
00629 
00630 {
00631         struct hlist_head  *hhead = cfs_hash_bd_hhead(hs, bd);
00632         struct hlist_node  *ehnode;
00633         struct hlist_node  *match;
00634         int  intent_add = (intent & CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_ADD) != 0;
00635 
00636         /* with this function, we can avoid a lot of useless refcount ops,
00637          * which are expensive atomic operations most time. */
00638         match = intent_add ? NULL : hnode;
00639         hlist_for_each(ehnode, hhead) {
00640                 if (!cfs_hash_keycmp(hs, key, ehnode))
00641                         continue;
00642 
00643                 if (match != NULL && match != ehnode) /* can't match */
00644                         continue;
00645 
00646                 /* match and ... */
00647                 if ((intent & CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_DEL) != 0) {
00648                         cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(hs, bd, ehnode);
00649                         return ehnode;
00650                 }
00651 
00652                 /* caller wants refcount? */
00653                 if ((intent & CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_REF) != 0)
00654                         cfs_hash_get(hs, ehnode);
00655                 return ehnode;
00656         }
00657         /* no match item */
00658         if (!intent_add)
00659                 return NULL;
00660 
00661         LASSERT(hnode != NULL);
00662         cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(hs, bd, hnode);
00663         return hnode;
00664 }
00665 
00666 struct hlist_node *
00667 cfs_hash_bd_lookup_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00668                           const void *key)
00669 {
00670         return cfs_hash_bd_lookup_intent(hs, bd, key, NULL,
00671                                         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_FIND);
00672 }
00673 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_bd_lookup_locked);
00674 
00675 struct hlist_node *
00676 cfs_hash_bd_peek_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00677                         const void *key)
00678 {
00679         return cfs_hash_bd_lookup_intent(hs, bd, key, NULL,
00680                                         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_PEEK);
00681 }
00682 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_bd_peek_locked);
00683 
00684 static void
00685 cfs_hash_multi_bd_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00686                        unsigned n, int excl)
00687 {
00688         struct cfs_hash_bucket *prev = NULL;
00689         int                i;
00690 
00696         cfs_hash_for_each_bd(bds, n, i) {
00697                 if (prev == bds[i].bd_bucket)
00698                         continue;
00699 
00700                 LASSERT(prev == NULL ||
00701                         prev->hsb_index < bds[i].bd_bucket->hsb_index);
00702                 cfs_hash_bd_lock(hs, &bds[i], excl);
00703                 prev = bds[i].bd_bucket;
00704         }
00705 }
00706 
00707 static void
00708 cfs_hash_multi_bd_unlock(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00709                          unsigned n, int excl)
00710 {
00711         struct cfs_hash_bucket *prev = NULL;
00712         int                i;
00713 
00714         cfs_hash_for_each_bd(bds, n, i) {
00715                 if (prev != bds[i].bd_bucket) {
00716                         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bds[i], excl);
00717                         prev = bds[i].bd_bucket;
00718                 }
00719         }
00720 }
00721 
00722 static struct hlist_node *
00723 cfs_hash_multi_bd_lookup_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00724                                 unsigned n, const void *key)
00725 {
00726         struct hlist_node *ehnode;
00727         unsigned          i;
00728 
00729         cfs_hash_for_each_bd(bds, n, i) {
00730                 ehnode = cfs_hash_bd_lookup_intent(hs, &bds[i], key, NULL,
00731                                                         CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_FIND);
00732                 if (ehnode != NULL)
00733                         return ehnode;
00734         }
00735         return NULL;
00736 }
00737 
00738 static struct hlist_node *
00739 cfs_hash_multi_bd_findadd_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00740                                  unsigned n, const void *key,
00741                                  struct hlist_node *hnode, int noref)
00742 {
00743         struct hlist_node *ehnode;
00744         int               intent;
00745         unsigned          i;
00746 
00747         LASSERT(hnode != NULL);
00748         intent = CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_PEEK | (!noref * CFS_HS_LOOKUP_MASK_REF);
00749 
00750         cfs_hash_for_each_bd(bds, n, i) {
00751                 ehnode = cfs_hash_bd_lookup_intent(hs, &bds[i], key,
00752                                                    NULL, intent);
00753                 if (ehnode != NULL)
00754                         return ehnode;
00755         }
00756 
00757         if (i == 1) { /* only one bucket */
00758                 cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(hs, &bds[0], hnode);
00759         } else {
00760                 struct cfs_hash_bd      mybd;
00761 
00762                 cfs_hash_bd_get(hs, key, &mybd);
00763                 cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(hs, &mybd, hnode);
00764         }
00765 
00766         return hnode;
00767 }
00768 
00769 static struct hlist_node *
00770 cfs_hash_multi_bd_finddel_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00771                                  unsigned n, const void *key,
00772                                  struct hlist_node *hnode)
00773 {
00774         struct hlist_node *ehnode;
00775         unsigned           i;
00776 
00777         cfs_hash_for_each_bd(bds, n, i) {
00778                 ehnode = cfs_hash_bd_lookup_intent(hs, &bds[i], key, hnode,
00779                                                    CFS_HS_LOOKUP_IT_FINDDEL);
00780                 if (ehnode != NULL)
00781                         return ehnode;
00782         }
00783         return NULL;
00784 }
00785 
00786 static void
00787 cfs_hash_bd_order(struct cfs_hash_bd *bd1, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd2)
00788 {
00789         int     rc;
00790 
00791         if (bd2->bd_bucket == NULL)
00792                 return;
00793 
00794         if (bd1->bd_bucket == NULL) {
00795                 *bd1 = *bd2;
00796                 bd2->bd_bucket = NULL;
00797                 return;
00798         }
00799 
00800         rc = cfs_hash_bd_compare(bd1, bd2);
00801         if (rc == 0) {
00802                 bd2->bd_bucket = NULL;
00803 
00804         } else if (rc > 0) { /* swab bd1 and bd2 */
00805                 struct cfs_hash_bd tmp;
00806 
00807                 tmp = *bd2;
00808                 *bd2 = *bd1;
00809                 *bd1 = tmp;
00810         }
00811 }
00812 
00813 void
00814 cfs_hash_dual_bd_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00815                      struct cfs_hash_bd *bds)
00816 {
00817         /* NB: caller should hold hs_lock.rw if REHASH is set */
00818         cfs_hash_bd_from_key(hs, hs->hs_buckets,
00819                              hs->hs_cur_bits, key, &bds[0]);
00820         if (likely(hs->hs_rehash_buckets == NULL)) {
00821                 /* no rehash or not rehashing */
00822                 bds[1].bd_bucket = NULL;
00823                 return;
00824         }
00825 
00826         LASSERT(hs->hs_rehash_bits != 0);
00827         cfs_hash_bd_from_key(hs, hs->hs_rehash_buckets,
00828                              hs->hs_rehash_bits, key, &bds[1]);
00829 
00830         cfs_hash_bd_order(&bds[0], &bds[1]);
00831 }
00832 
00833 void
00834 cfs_hash_dual_bd_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds, int excl)
00835 {
00836         cfs_hash_multi_bd_lock(hs, bds, 2, excl);
00837 }
00838 
00839 void
00840 cfs_hash_dual_bd_unlock(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds, int excl)
00841 {
00842         cfs_hash_multi_bd_unlock(hs, bds, 2, excl);
00843 }
00844 
00845 struct hlist_node *
00846 cfs_hash_dual_bd_lookup_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00847                                const void *key)
00848 {
00849         return cfs_hash_multi_bd_lookup_locked(hs, bds, 2, key);
00850 }
00851 
00852 struct hlist_node *
00853 cfs_hash_dual_bd_findadd_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00854                                 const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode,
00855                                 int noref)
00856 {
00857         return cfs_hash_multi_bd_findadd_locked(hs, bds, 2, key,
00858                                                 hnode, noref);
00859 }
00860 
00861 struct hlist_node *
00862 cfs_hash_dual_bd_finddel_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00863                                 const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00864 {
00865         return cfs_hash_multi_bd_finddel_locked(hs, bds, 2, key, hnode);
00866 }
00867 
00868 static void
00869 cfs_hash_buckets_free(struct cfs_hash_bucket **buckets,
00870                       int bkt_size, int prev_size, int size)
00871 {
00872         int     i;
00873 
00874         for (i = prev_size; i < size; i++) {
00875                 if (buckets[i] != NULL)
00876                         LIBCFS_FREE(buckets[i], bkt_size);
00877         }
00878 
00879         LIBCFS_FREE(buckets, sizeof(buckets[0]) * size);
00880 }
00881 
00882 /*
00883  * Create or grow bucket memory. Return old_buckets if no allocation was
00884  * needed, the newly allocated buckets if allocation was needed and
00885  * successful, and NULL on error.
00886  */
00887 static struct cfs_hash_bucket **
00888 cfs_hash_buckets_realloc(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bucket **old_bkts,
00889                          unsigned int old_size, unsigned int new_size)
00890 {
00891         struct cfs_hash_bucket **new_bkts;
00892         int                 i;
00893 
00894         LASSERT(old_size == 0 || old_bkts != NULL);
00895 
00896         if (old_bkts != NULL && old_size == new_size)
00897                 return old_bkts;
00898 
00899         LIBCFS_ALLOC(new_bkts, sizeof(new_bkts[0]) * new_size);
00900         if (new_bkts == NULL)
00901                 return NULL;
00902 
00903         if (old_bkts != NULL) {
00904                 memcpy(new_bkts, old_bkts,
00905                        min(old_size, new_size) * sizeof(*old_bkts));
00906         }
00907 
00908         for (i = old_size; i < new_size; i++) {
00909                 struct hlist_head *hhead;
00910                 struct cfs_hash_bd     bd;
00911 
00912                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(new_bkts[i], cfs_hash_bkt_size(hs));
00913                 if (new_bkts[i] == NULL) {
00914                         cfs_hash_buckets_free(new_bkts, cfs_hash_bkt_size(hs),
00915                                               old_size, new_size);
00916                         return NULL;
00917                 }
00918 
00919                 new_bkts[i]->hsb_index   = i;
00920                 new_bkts[i]->hsb_version = 1;  /* shouldn't be zero */
00921                 new_bkts[i]->hsb_depmax  = -1; /* unknown */
00922                 bd.bd_bucket = new_bkts[i];
00923                 cfs_hash_bd_for_each_hlist(hs, &bd, hhead)
00924                         INIT_HLIST_HEAD(hhead);
00925 
00926                 if (cfs_hash_with_no_lock(hs) ||
00927                     cfs_hash_with_no_bktlock(hs))
00928                         continue;
00929 
00930                 if (cfs_hash_with_rw_bktlock(hs))
00931                         rwlock_init(&new_bkts[i]->hsb_lock.rw);
00932                 else if (cfs_hash_with_spin_bktlock(hs))
00933                         spin_lock_init(&new_bkts[i]->hsb_lock.spin);
00934                 else
00935                         LBUG(); /* invalid use-case */
00936         }
00937         return new_bkts;
00938 }
00939 
00949 static int cfs_hash_rehash_worker(struct cfs_workitem *wi);
00950 
00951 #if CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL >= CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1
00952 static int cfs_hash_dep_print(struct cfs_workitem *wi)
00953 {
00954         struct cfs_hash *hs = container_of(wi, struct cfs_hash, hs_dep_wi);
00955         int         dep;
00956         int         bkt;
00957         int         off;
00958         int         bits;
00959 
00960         spin_lock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00961         dep  = hs->hs_dep_max;
00962         bkt  = hs->hs_dep_bkt;
00963         off  = hs->hs_dep_off;
00964         bits = hs->hs_dep_bits;
00965         spin_unlock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00966 
00967         LCONSOLE_WARN("#### HASH %s (bits: %d): max depth %d at bucket %d/%d\n",
00968                       hs->hs_name, bits, dep, bkt, off);
00969         spin_lock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00970         hs->hs_dep_bits = 0; /* mark as workitem done */
00971         spin_unlock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00972         return 0;
00973 }
00974 
00975 static void cfs_hash_depth_wi_init(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00976 {
00977         spin_lock_init(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00978         cfs_wi_init(&hs->hs_dep_wi, hs, cfs_hash_dep_print);
00979 }
00980 
00981 static void cfs_hash_depth_wi_cancel(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00982 {
00983         if (cfs_wi_deschedule(cfs_sched_rehash, &hs->hs_dep_wi))
00984                 return;
00985 
00986         spin_lock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00987         while (hs->hs_dep_bits != 0) {
00988                 spin_unlock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00989                 cond_resched();
00990                 spin_lock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00991         }
00992         spin_unlock(&hs->hs_dep_lock);
00993 }
00994 
00995 #else /* CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL < CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1 */
00996 
00997 static inline void cfs_hash_depth_wi_init(struct cfs_hash *hs) {}
00998 static inline void cfs_hash_depth_wi_cancel(struct cfs_hash *hs) {}
00999 
01000 #endif /* CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL >= CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1 */
01001 
01002 struct cfs_hash *
01003 cfs_hash_create(char *name, unsigned cur_bits, unsigned max_bits,
01004                 unsigned bkt_bits, unsigned extra_bytes,
01005                 unsigned min_theta, unsigned max_theta,
01006                 struct cfs_hash_ops *ops, unsigned flags)
01007 {
01008         struct cfs_hash *hs;
01009         int         len;
01010 
01011         ENTRY;
01012 
01013         CLASSERT(CFS_HASH_THETA_BITS < 15);
01014 
01015         LASSERT(name != NULL);
01016         LASSERT(ops != NULL);
01017         LASSERT(ops->hs_key);
01018         LASSERT(ops->hs_hash);
01019         LASSERT(ops->hs_object);
01020         LASSERT(ops->hs_keycmp);
01021         LASSERT(ops->hs_get != NULL);
01022         LASSERT(ops->hs_put != NULL || ops->hs_put_locked != NULL);
01023 
01024         if ((flags & CFS_HASH_REHASH) != 0)
01025                 flags |= CFS_HASH_COUNTER; /* must have counter */
01026 
01027         LASSERT(cur_bits > 0);
01028         LASSERT(cur_bits >= bkt_bits);
01029         LASSERT(max_bits >= cur_bits && max_bits < 31);
01030         LASSERT(ergo((flags & CFS_HASH_REHASH) == 0, cur_bits == max_bits));
01031         LASSERT(ergo((flags & CFS_HASH_REHASH) != 0,
01032                      (flags & CFS_HASH_NO_LOCK) == 0));
01033         LASSERT(ergo((flags & CFS_HASH_REHASH_KEY) != 0,
01034                       ops->hs_keycpy != NULL));
01035 
01036         len = (flags & CFS_HASH_BIGNAME) == 0 ?
01037               CFS_HASH_NAME_LEN : CFS_HASH_BIGNAME_LEN;
01038         LIBCFS_ALLOC(hs, offsetof(struct cfs_hash, hs_name[len]));
01039         if (hs == NULL)
01040                 RETURN(NULL);
01041 
01042         strlcpy(hs->hs_name, name, len);
01043         hs->hs_flags = flags;
01044 
01045         atomic_set(&hs->hs_refcount, 1);
01046         atomic_set(&hs->hs_count, 0);
01047 
01048         cfs_hash_lock_setup(hs);
01049         cfs_hash_hlist_setup(hs);
01050 
01051         hs->hs_cur_bits = (__u8)cur_bits;
01052         hs->hs_min_bits = (__u8)cur_bits;
01053         hs->hs_max_bits = (__u8)max_bits;
01054         hs->hs_bkt_bits = (__u8)bkt_bits;
01055 
01056         hs->hs_ops         = ops;
01057         hs->hs_extra_bytes = extra_bytes;
01058         hs->hs_rehash_bits = 0;
01059         cfs_wi_init(&hs->hs_rehash_wi, hs, cfs_hash_rehash_worker);
01060         cfs_hash_depth_wi_init(hs);
01061 
01062         if (cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs))
01063                 __cfs_hash_set_theta(hs, min_theta, max_theta);
01064 
01065         hs->hs_buckets = cfs_hash_buckets_realloc(hs, NULL, 0,
01066                                                   CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs));
01067         if (hs->hs_buckets != NULL)
01068                 return hs;
01069 
01070         LIBCFS_FREE(hs, offsetof(struct cfs_hash, hs_name[len]));
01071         RETURN(NULL);
01072 }
01073 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_create);
01074 
01078 static void
01079 cfs_hash_destroy(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01080 {
01081         struct hlist_node     *hnode;
01082         struct hlist_node     *pos;
01083         struct cfs_hash_bd         bd;
01084         int                   i;
01085         ENTRY;
01086 
01087         LASSERT(hs != NULL);
01088         LASSERT(!cfs_hash_is_exiting(hs) &&
01089                 !cfs_hash_is_iterating(hs));
01090 
01095         hs->hs_exiting = 1;
01096         if (cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs))
01097                 cfs_hash_rehash_cancel(hs);
01098 
01099         cfs_hash_depth_wi_cancel(hs);
01100         /* rehash should be done/canceled */
01101         LASSERT(hs->hs_buckets != NULL &&
01102                 hs->hs_rehash_buckets == NULL);
01103 
01104         cfs_hash_for_each_bucket(hs, &bd, i) {
01105                 struct hlist_head *hhead;
01106 
01107                 LASSERT(bd.bd_bucket != NULL);
01108                 /* no need to take this lock, just for consistent code */
01109                 cfs_hash_bd_lock(hs, &bd, 1);
01110 
01111                 cfs_hash_bd_for_each_hlist(hs, &bd, hhead) {
01112                         hlist_for_each_safe(hnode, pos, hhead) {
01113                                         LASSERTF(!cfs_hash_with_assert_empty(hs),
01114                                         "hash %s bucket %u(%u) is not "
01115                                         " empty: %u items left\n",
01116                                         hs->hs_name, bd.bd_bucket->hsb_index,
01117                                         bd.bd_offset, bd.bd_bucket->hsb_count);
01118                                 /* can't assert key valicate, because we
01119                                  * can interrupt rehash */
01120                                 cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(hs, &bd, hnode);
01121                                 cfs_hash_exit(hs, hnode);
01122                         }
01123                 }
01124                 LASSERT(bd.bd_bucket->hsb_count == 0);
01125                 cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, 1);
01126                 cond_resched();
01127         }
01128 
01129         LASSERT(atomic_read(&hs->hs_count) == 0);
01130 
01131         cfs_hash_buckets_free(hs->hs_buckets, cfs_hash_bkt_size(hs),
01132                               0, CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs));
01133         i = cfs_hash_with_bigname(hs) ?
01134             CFS_HASH_BIGNAME_LEN : CFS_HASH_NAME_LEN;
01135         LIBCFS_FREE(hs, offsetof(struct cfs_hash, hs_name[i]));
01136 
01137         EXIT;
01138 }
01139 
01140 struct cfs_hash *cfs_hash_getref(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01141 {
01142         if (atomic_inc_not_zero(&hs->hs_refcount))
01143                 return hs;
01144         return NULL;
01145 }
01146 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_getref);
01147 
01148 void cfs_hash_putref(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01149 {
01150         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&hs->hs_refcount))
01151                 cfs_hash_destroy(hs);
01152 }
01153 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_putref);
01154 
01155 static inline int
01156 cfs_hash_rehash_bits(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01157 {
01158         if (cfs_hash_with_no_lock(hs) ||
01159             !cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs))
01160                 return -EOPNOTSUPP;
01161 
01162         if (unlikely(cfs_hash_is_exiting(hs)))
01163                 return -ESRCH;
01164 
01165         if (unlikely(cfs_hash_is_rehashing(hs)))
01166                 return -EALREADY;
01167 
01168         if (unlikely(cfs_hash_is_iterating(hs)))
01169                 return -EAGAIN;
01170 
01171         /* XXX: need to handle case with max_theta != 2.0
01172          *      and the case with min_theta != 0.5 */
01173         if ((hs->hs_cur_bits < hs->hs_max_bits) &&
01174             (__cfs_hash_theta(hs) > hs->hs_max_theta))
01175                 return hs->hs_cur_bits + 1;
01176 
01177         if (!cfs_hash_with_shrink(hs))
01178                 return 0;
01179 
01180         if ((hs->hs_cur_bits > hs->hs_min_bits) &&
01181             (__cfs_hash_theta(hs) < hs->hs_min_theta))
01182                 return hs->hs_cur_bits - 1;
01183 
01184         return 0;
01185 }
01186 
01192 static inline int
01193 cfs_hash_rehash_inline(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01194 {
01195         return !cfs_hash_with_nblk_change(hs) &&
01196                atomic_read(&hs->hs_count) < CFS_HASH_LOOP_HOG;
01197 }
01198 
01203 void
01204 cfs_hash_add(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
01205 {
01206         struct cfs_hash_bd   bd;
01207         int             bits;
01208 
01209         LASSERT(hlist_unhashed(hnode));
01210 
01211         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01212         cfs_hash_bd_get_and_lock(hs, key, &bd, 1);
01213 
01214         cfs_hash_key_validate(hs, key, hnode);
01215         cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(hs, &bd, hnode);
01216 
01217         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, 1);
01218 
01219         bits = cfs_hash_rehash_bits(hs);
01220         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01221         if (bits > 0)
01222                 cfs_hash_rehash(hs, cfs_hash_rehash_inline(hs));
01223 }
01224 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_add);
01225 
01226 static struct hlist_node *
01227 cfs_hash_find_or_add(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
01228                      struct hlist_node *hnode, int noref)
01229 {
01230         struct hlist_node *ehnode;
01231         struct cfs_hash_bd     bds[2];
01232         int               bits = 0;
01233 
01234         LASSERTF(hlist_unhashed(hnode), "hnode = %p\n", hnode);
01235 
01236         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01237         cfs_hash_dual_bd_get_and_lock(hs, key, bds, 1);
01238 
01239         cfs_hash_key_validate(hs, key, hnode);
01240         ehnode = cfs_hash_dual_bd_findadd_locked(hs, bds, key,
01241                                                  hnode, noref);
01242         cfs_hash_dual_bd_unlock(hs, bds, 1);
01243 
01244         if (ehnode == hnode) /* new item added */
01245                 bits = cfs_hash_rehash_bits(hs);
01246         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01247         if (bits > 0)
01248                 cfs_hash_rehash(hs, cfs_hash_rehash_inline(hs));
01249 
01250         return ehnode;
01251 }
01252 
01258 int
01259 cfs_hash_add_unique(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
01260                     struct hlist_node *hnode)
01261 {
01262         return cfs_hash_find_or_add(hs, key, hnode, 1) != hnode ?
01263                -EALREADY : 0;
01264 }
01265 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_add_unique);
01266 
01273 void *
01274 cfs_hash_findadd_unique(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
01275                         struct hlist_node *hnode)
01276 {
01277         hnode = cfs_hash_find_or_add(hs, key, hnode, 0);
01278 
01279         return cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
01280 }
01281 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_findadd_unique);
01282 
01290 void *
01291 cfs_hash_del(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
01292 {
01293         void           *obj  = NULL;
01294         int             bits = 0;
01295         struct cfs_hash_bd   bds[2];
01296 
01297         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01298         cfs_hash_dual_bd_get_and_lock(hs, key, bds, 1);
01299 
01300         /* NB: do nothing if @hnode is not in hash table */
01301         if (hnode == NULL || !hlist_unhashed(hnode)) {
01302                 if (bds[1].bd_bucket == NULL && hnode != NULL) {
01303                         cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(hs, &bds[0], hnode);
01304                 } else {
01305                         hnode = cfs_hash_dual_bd_finddel_locked(hs, bds,
01306                                                                 key, hnode);
01307                 }
01308         }
01309 
01310         if (hnode != NULL) {
01311                 obj  = cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
01312                 bits = cfs_hash_rehash_bits(hs);
01313         }
01314 
01315         cfs_hash_dual_bd_unlock(hs, bds, 1);
01316         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01317         if (bits > 0)
01318                 cfs_hash_rehash(hs, cfs_hash_rehash_inline(hs));
01319 
01320         return obj;
01321 }
01322 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_del);
01323 
01330 void *
01331 cfs_hash_del_key(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key)
01332 {
01333         return cfs_hash_del(hs, key, NULL);
01334 }
01335 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_del_key);
01336 
01345 void *
01346 cfs_hash_lookup(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key)
01347 {
01348         void                 *obj = NULL;
01349         struct hlist_node     *hnode;
01350         struct cfs_hash_bd         bds[2];
01351 
01352         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01353         cfs_hash_dual_bd_get_and_lock(hs, key, bds, 0);
01354 
01355         hnode = cfs_hash_dual_bd_lookup_locked(hs, bds, key);
01356         if (hnode != NULL)
01357                 obj = cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
01358 
01359         cfs_hash_dual_bd_unlock(hs, bds, 0);
01360         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01361 
01362         return obj;
01363 }
01364 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_lookup);
01365 
01366 static void
01367 cfs_hash_for_each_enter(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01368 {
01369         LASSERT(!cfs_hash_is_exiting(hs));
01370 
01371         if (!cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs))
01372                 return;
01373         /*
01374          * NB: it's race on cfs_has_t::hs_iterating, but doesn't matter
01375          * because it's just an unreliable signal to rehash-thread,
01376          * rehash-thread will try to finish rehash ASAP when seeing this.
01377          */
01378         hs->hs_iterating = 1;
01379 
01380         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1);
01381         hs->hs_iterators++;
01382 
01383         /* NB: iteration is mostly called by service thread,
01384          * we tend to cancel pending rehash-request, instead of
01385          * blocking service thread, we will relaunch rehash request
01386          * after iteration */
01387         if (cfs_hash_is_rehashing(hs))
01388                 cfs_hash_rehash_cancel_locked(hs);
01389         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01390 }
01391 
01392 static void
01393 cfs_hash_for_each_exit(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01394 {
01395         int remained;
01396         int bits;
01397 
01398         if (!cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs))
01399                 return;
01400         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1);
01401         remained = --hs->hs_iterators;
01402         bits = cfs_hash_rehash_bits(hs);
01403         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01404         /* NB: it's race on cfs_has_t::hs_iterating, see above */
01405         if (remained == 0)
01406                 hs->hs_iterating = 0;
01407         if (bits > 0) {
01408                 cfs_hash_rehash(hs, atomic_read(&hs->hs_count) <
01409                                     CFS_HASH_LOOP_HOG);
01410         }
01411 }
01412 
01423 static __u64
01424 cfs_hash_for_each_tight(struct cfs_hash *hs, cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t func,
01425                         void *data, int remove_safe)
01426 {
01427         struct hlist_node       *hnode;
01428         struct hlist_node       *pos;
01429         struct cfs_hash_bd      bd;
01430         __u64                   count = 0;
01431         int                     excl  = !!remove_safe;
01432         int                     loop  = 0;
01433         int                     i;
01434         ENTRY;
01435 
01436         cfs_hash_for_each_enter(hs);
01437 
01438         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01439         LASSERT(!cfs_hash_is_rehashing(hs));
01440 
01441         cfs_hash_for_each_bucket(hs, &bd, i) {
01442                 struct hlist_head *hhead;
01443 
01444                 cfs_hash_bd_lock(hs, &bd, excl);
01445                 if (func == NULL) { /* only glimpse size */
01446                         count += bd.bd_bucket->hsb_count;
01447                         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, excl);
01448                         continue;
01449                 }
01450 
01451                 cfs_hash_bd_for_each_hlist(hs, &bd, hhead) {
01452                         hlist_for_each_safe(hnode, pos, hhead) {
01453                                 cfs_hash_bucket_validate(hs, &bd, hnode);
01454                                 count++;
01455                                 loop++;
01456                                 if (func(hs, &bd, hnode, data)) {
01457                                         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, excl);
01458                                         goto out;
01459                                 }
01460                         }
01461                 }
01462                 cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, excl);
01463                 if (loop < CFS_HASH_LOOP_HOG)
01464                         continue;
01465                 loop = 0;
01466                 cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01467                 cond_resched();
01468                 cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01469         }
01470  out:
01471         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01472 
01473         cfs_hash_for_each_exit(hs);
01474         RETURN(count);
01475 }
01476 
01477 struct cfs_hash_cond_arg {
01478         cfs_hash_cond_opt_cb_t  func;
01479         void                   *arg;
01480 };
01481 
01482 static int
01483 cfs_hash_cond_del_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
01484                          struct hlist_node *hnode, void *data)
01485 {
01486         struct cfs_hash_cond_arg *cond = data;
01487 
01488         if (cond->func(cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode), cond->arg))
01489                 cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(hs, bd, hnode);
01490         return 0;
01491 }
01492 
01498 void
01499 cfs_hash_cond_del(struct cfs_hash *hs, cfs_hash_cond_opt_cb_t func, void *data)
01500 {
01501         struct cfs_hash_cond_arg arg = {
01502                 .func   = func,
01503                 .arg    = data,
01504         };
01505 
01506         cfs_hash_for_each_tight(hs, cfs_hash_cond_del_locked, &arg, 1);
01507 }
01508 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_cond_del);
01509 
01510 void
01511 cfs_hash_for_each(struct cfs_hash *hs,
01512                   cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t func, void *data)
01513 {
01514         cfs_hash_for_each_tight(hs, func, data, 0);
01515 }
01516 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_for_each);
01517 
01518 void
01519 cfs_hash_for_each_safe(struct cfs_hash *hs,
01520                        cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t func, void *data)
01521 {
01522         cfs_hash_for_each_tight(hs, func, data, 1);
01523 }
01524 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_for_each_safe);
01525 
01526 static int
01527 cfs_hash_peek(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
01528               struct hlist_node *hnode, void *data)
01529 {
01530         *(int *)data = 0;
01531         return 1; /* return 1 to break the loop */
01532 }
01533 
01534 int
01535 cfs_hash_is_empty(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01536 {
01537         int empty = 1;
01538 
01539         cfs_hash_for_each_tight(hs, cfs_hash_peek, &empty, 0);
01540         return empty;
01541 }
01542 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_is_empty);
01543 
01544 __u64
01545 cfs_hash_size_get(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01546 {
01547         return cfs_hash_with_counter(hs) ?
01548                atomic_read(&hs->hs_count) :
01549                cfs_hash_for_each_tight(hs, NULL, NULL, 0);
01550 }
01551 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_size_get);
01552 
01553 /*
01554  * cfs_hash_for_each_relax:
01555  * Iterate the hash table and call @func on each item without
01556  * any lock. This function can't guarantee to finish iteration
01557  * if these features are enabled:
01558  *
01559  *  a. if rehash_key is enabled, an item can be moved from
01560  *     one bucket to another bucket
01561  *  b. user can remove non-zero-ref item from hash-table,
01562  *     so the item can be removed from hash-table, even worse,
01563  *     it's possible that user changed key and insert to another
01564  *     hash bucket.
01565  * there's no way for us to finish iteration correctly on previous
01566  * two cases, so iteration has to be stopped on change.
01567  */
01568 static int
01569 cfs_hash_for_each_relax(struct cfs_hash *hs, cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t func,
01570                         void *data, int start)
01571 {
01572         struct hlist_node       *hnode;
01573         struct hlist_node       *next = NULL;
01574         struct cfs_hash_bd      bd;
01575         __u32                   version;
01576         int                     count = 0;
01577         int                     stop_on_change;
01578         int                     has_put_locked;
01579         int                     rc = 0;
01580         int                     i, end = -1;
01581         ENTRY;
01582 
01583         stop_on_change = cfs_hash_with_rehash_key(hs) ||
01584                          !cfs_hash_with_no_itemref(hs);
01585         has_put_locked = hs->hs_ops->hs_put_locked != NULL;
01586         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01587 again:
01588         LASSERT(!cfs_hash_is_rehashing(hs));
01589 
01590         cfs_hash_for_each_bucket(hs, &bd, i) {
01591                 struct hlist_head *hhead;
01592 
01593                 if (i < start)
01594                         continue;
01595                 else if (end > 0 && i >= end)
01596                         break;
01597 
01598                 cfs_hash_bd_lock(hs, &bd, 0);
01599                 version = cfs_hash_bd_version_get(&bd);
01600 
01601                 cfs_hash_bd_for_each_hlist(hs, &bd, hhead) {
01602                         hnode = hhead->first;
01603                         if (hnode == NULL)
01604                                 continue;
01605                         cfs_hash_get(hs, hnode);
01606                         for (; hnode != NULL; hnode = next) {
01607                                 cfs_hash_bucket_validate(hs, &bd, hnode);
01608                                 next = hnode->next;
01609                                 if (next != NULL)
01610                                         cfs_hash_get(hs, next);
01611                                 cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, 0);
01612                                 cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01613 
01614                                 rc = func(hs, &bd, hnode, data);
01615                                 if (stop_on_change || !has_put_locked)
01616                                         cfs_hash_put(hs, hnode);
01617 
01618                                 cond_resched();
01619                                 count++;
01620 
01621                                 cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01622                                 cfs_hash_bd_lock(hs, &bd, 0);
01623                                 if (stop_on_change) {
01624                                         if (version !=
01625                                             cfs_hash_bd_version_get(&bd))
01626                                                 rc = -EINTR;
01627                                 } else if (has_put_locked) {
01628                                         cfs_hash_put_locked(hs, hnode);
01629                                 }
01630                                 if (rc) /* callback wants to break iteration */
01631                                         break;
01632                         }
01633                         if (next != NULL) {
01634                                 if (has_put_locked) {
01635                                         cfs_hash_put_locked(hs, next);
01636                                         next = NULL;
01637                                 }
01638                                 break;
01639                         } else if (rc != 0) {
01640                                 break;
01641                         }
01642                 }
01643                 cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, 0);
01644                 if (next != NULL && !has_put_locked) {
01645                         cfs_hash_put(hs, next);
01646                         next = NULL;
01647                 }
01648                 if (rc) /* callback wants to break iteration */
01649                         break;
01650         }
01651 
01652         if (start > 0 && rc == 0) {
01653                 end = start;
01654                 start = 0;
01655                 goto again;
01656         }
01657 
01658         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01659         return count;
01660 }
01661 
01662 int
01663 cfs_hash_for_each_nolock(struct cfs_hash *hs,
01664                          cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t func, void *data, int start)
01665 {
01666         ENTRY;
01667 
01668         if (cfs_hash_with_no_lock(hs) ||
01669             cfs_hash_with_rehash_key(hs) ||
01670             !cfs_hash_with_no_itemref(hs))
01671                 RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
01672 
01673         if (hs->hs_ops->hs_get == NULL ||
01674            (hs->hs_ops->hs_put == NULL &&
01675             hs->hs_ops->hs_put_locked == NULL))
01676                 RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
01677 
01678         cfs_hash_for_each_enter(hs);
01679         cfs_hash_for_each_relax(hs, func, data, start);
01680         cfs_hash_for_each_exit(hs);
01681 
01682         RETURN(0);
01683 }
01684 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_for_each_nolock);
01685 
01697 int
01698 cfs_hash_for_each_empty(struct cfs_hash *hs,
01699                         cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t func, void *data)
01700 {
01701         unsigned  i = 0;
01702         ENTRY;
01703 
01704         if (cfs_hash_with_no_lock(hs))
01705                 return -EOPNOTSUPP;
01706 
01707         if (hs->hs_ops->hs_get == NULL ||
01708            (hs->hs_ops->hs_put == NULL &&
01709             hs->hs_ops->hs_put_locked == NULL))
01710                 return -EOPNOTSUPP;
01711 
01712         cfs_hash_for_each_enter(hs);
01713         while (cfs_hash_for_each_relax(hs, func, data, 0)) {
01714                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Try to empty hash: %s, loop: %u\n",
01715                        hs->hs_name, i++);
01716         }
01717         cfs_hash_for_each_exit(hs);
01718         RETURN(0);
01719 }
01720 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_for_each_empty);
01721 
01722 void
01723 cfs_hash_hlist_for_each(struct cfs_hash *hs, unsigned hindex,
01724                         cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t func, void *data)
01725 {
01726         struct hlist_head *hhead;
01727         struct hlist_node *hnode;
01728         struct cfs_hash_bd         bd;
01729 
01730         cfs_hash_for_each_enter(hs);
01731         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01732         if (hindex >= CFS_HASH_NHLIST(hs))
01733                 goto out;
01734 
01735         cfs_hash_bd_index_set(hs, hindex, &bd);
01736 
01737         cfs_hash_bd_lock(hs, &bd, 0);
01738         hhead = cfs_hash_bd_hhead(hs, &bd);
01739         hlist_for_each(hnode, hhead) {
01740                 if (func(hs, &bd, hnode, data))
01741                         break;
01742         }
01743         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, 0);
01744 out:
01745         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01746         cfs_hash_for_each_exit(hs);
01747 }
01748 
01749 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_hlist_for_each);
01750 
01751 /*
01752  * For each item in the libcfs hash @hs which matches the @key call
01753  * the passed callback @func and pass to it as an argument each hash
01754  * item and the private @data. During the callback the bucket lock
01755  * is held so the callback must never sleep.
01756    */
01757 void
01758 cfs_hash_for_each_key(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
01759                         cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t func, void *data)
01760 {
01761         struct hlist_node *hnode;
01762         struct cfs_hash_bd         bds[2];
01763         unsigned           i;
01764 
01765         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01766 
01767         cfs_hash_dual_bd_get_and_lock(hs, key, bds, 0);
01768 
01769         cfs_hash_for_each_bd(bds, 2, i) {
01770                 struct hlist_head *hlist = cfs_hash_bd_hhead(hs, &bds[i]);
01771 
01772                 hlist_for_each(hnode, hlist) {
01773                         cfs_hash_bucket_validate(hs, &bds[i], hnode);
01774 
01775                         if (cfs_hash_keycmp(hs, key, hnode)) {
01776                                 if (func(hs, &bds[i], hnode, data))
01777                                         break;
01778                         }
01779                 }
01780         }
01781 
01782         cfs_hash_dual_bd_unlock(hs, bds, 0);
01783         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01784 }
01785 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_for_each_key);
01786 
01798 void
01799 cfs_hash_rehash_cancel_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01800 {
01801         int     i;
01802 
01803         /* need hold cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1) */
01804         LASSERT(cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs) &&
01805                 !cfs_hash_with_no_lock(hs));
01806 
01807         if (!cfs_hash_is_rehashing(hs))
01808                 return;
01809 
01810         if (cfs_wi_deschedule(cfs_sched_rehash, &hs->hs_rehash_wi)) {
01811                 hs->hs_rehash_bits = 0;
01812                 return;
01813         }
01814 
01815         for (i = 2; cfs_hash_is_rehashing(hs); i++) {
01816                 cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01817                 /* raise console warning while waiting too long */
01818                 CDEBUG(IS_PO2(i >> 3) ? D_WARNING : D_INFO,
01819                        "hash %s is still rehashing, rescheded %d\n",
01820                        hs->hs_name, i - 1);
01821                 cond_resched();
01822                 cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1);
01823         }
01824 }
01825 
01826 void
01827 cfs_hash_rehash_cancel(struct cfs_hash *hs)
01828 {
01829         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1);
01830         cfs_hash_rehash_cancel_locked(hs);
01831         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01832 }
01833 
01834 int
01835 cfs_hash_rehash(struct cfs_hash *hs, int do_rehash)
01836 {
01837         int     rc;
01838 
01839         LASSERT(cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs) && !cfs_hash_with_no_lock(hs));
01840 
01841         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1);
01842 
01843         rc = cfs_hash_rehash_bits(hs);
01844         if (rc <= 0) {
01845                 cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01846                 return rc;
01847         }
01848 
01849         hs->hs_rehash_bits = rc;
01850         if (!do_rehash) {
01851                 /* launch and return */
01852                 cfs_wi_schedule(cfs_sched_rehash, &hs->hs_rehash_wi);
01853                 cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01854                 return 0;
01855         }
01856 
01857         /* rehash right now */
01858         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01859 
01860         return cfs_hash_rehash_worker(&hs->hs_rehash_wi);
01861 }
01862 
01863 static int
01864 cfs_hash_rehash_bd(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *old)
01865 {
01866         struct cfs_hash_bd      new;
01867         struct hlist_head *hhead;
01868         struct hlist_node *hnode;
01869         struct hlist_node *pos;
01870         void              *key;
01871         int                c = 0;
01872 
01873         /* hold cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1), so don't need any bucket lock */
01874         cfs_hash_bd_for_each_hlist(hs, old, hhead) {
01875                 hlist_for_each_safe(hnode, pos, hhead) {
01876                         key = cfs_hash_key(hs, hnode);
01877                         LASSERT(key != NULL);
01878                         /* Validate hnode is in the correct bucket. */
01879                         cfs_hash_bucket_validate(hs, old, hnode);
01880                         /*
01881                          * Delete from old hash bucket; move to new bucket.
01882                          * ops->hs_key must be defined.
01883                          */
01884                         cfs_hash_bd_from_key(hs, hs->hs_rehash_buckets,
01885                                              hs->hs_rehash_bits, key, &new);
01886                         cfs_hash_bd_move_locked(hs, old, &new, hnode);
01887                         c++;
01888                 }
01889         }
01890         return c;
01891 }
01892 
01893 static int
01894 cfs_hash_rehash_worker(struct cfs_workitem *wi)
01895 {
01896         struct cfs_hash         *hs =
01897                 container_of(wi, struct cfs_hash, hs_rehash_wi);
01898         struct cfs_hash_bucket **bkts;
01899         struct cfs_hash_bd      bd;
01900         unsigned int            old_size;
01901         unsigned int            new_size;
01902         int                     bsize;
01903         int                     count = 0;
01904         int                     rc = 0;
01905         int                     i;
01906 
01907         LASSERT(hs != NULL && cfs_hash_with_rehash(hs));
01908 
01909         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
01910         LASSERT(cfs_hash_is_rehashing(hs));
01911 
01912         old_size = CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs);
01913         new_size = CFS_HASH_RH_NBKT(hs);
01914 
01915         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
01916 
01917         /*
01918          * don't need hs::hs_rwlock for hs::hs_buckets,
01919          * because nobody can change bkt-table except me.
01920          */
01921         bkts = cfs_hash_buckets_realloc(hs, hs->hs_buckets,
01922                                         old_size, new_size);
01923         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1);
01924         if (bkts == NULL) {
01925                 rc = -ENOMEM;
01926                 goto out;
01927         }
01928 
01929         if (bkts == hs->hs_buckets) {
01930                 bkts = NULL; /* do nothing */
01931                 goto out;
01932         }
01933 
01934         rc = __cfs_hash_theta(hs);
01935         if ((rc >= hs->hs_min_theta) && (rc <= hs->hs_max_theta)) {
01936                 /* free the new allocated bkt-table */
01937                 old_size = new_size;
01938                 new_size = CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs);
01939                 rc = -EALREADY;
01940                 goto out;
01941         }
01942 
01943         LASSERT(hs->hs_rehash_buckets == NULL);
01944         hs->hs_rehash_buckets = bkts;
01945 
01946         rc = 0;
01947         cfs_hash_for_each_bucket(hs, &bd, i) {
01948                 if (cfs_hash_is_exiting(hs)) {
01949                         rc = -ESRCH;
01950                         /* someone wants to destroy the hash, abort now */
01951                         if (old_size < new_size) /* OK to free old bkt-table */
01952                                 break;
01953                         /* it's shrinking, need free new bkt-table */
01954                         hs->hs_rehash_buckets = NULL;
01955                         old_size = new_size;
01956                         new_size = CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs);
01957                         goto out;
01958                 }
01959 
01960                 count += cfs_hash_rehash_bd(hs, &bd);
01961                 if (count < CFS_HASH_LOOP_HOG ||
01962                     cfs_hash_is_iterating(hs)) { /* need to finish ASAP */
01963                         continue;
01964                 }
01965 
01966                 count = 0;
01967                 cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01968                 cond_resched();
01969                 cfs_hash_lock(hs, 1);
01970         }
01971 
01972         hs->hs_rehash_count++;
01973 
01974         bkts = hs->hs_buckets;
01975         hs->hs_buckets = hs->hs_rehash_buckets;
01976         hs->hs_rehash_buckets = NULL;
01977 
01978         hs->hs_cur_bits = hs->hs_rehash_bits;
01979  out:
01980         hs->hs_rehash_bits = 0;
01981         if (rc == -ESRCH) /* never be scheduled again */
01982                 cfs_wi_exit(cfs_sched_rehash, wi);
01983         bsize = cfs_hash_bkt_size(hs);
01984         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 1);
01985         /* can't refer to @hs anymore because it could be destroyed */
01986         if (bkts != NULL)
01987                 cfs_hash_buckets_free(bkts, bsize, new_size, old_size);
01988         if (rc != 0)
01989                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "early quit of rehashing: %d\n", rc);
01990         /* return 1 only if cfs_wi_exit is called */
01991         return rc == -ESRCH;
01992 }
01993 
02004 void cfs_hash_rehash_key(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *old_key,
02005                          void *new_key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
02006 {
02007         struct cfs_hash_bd        bds[3];
02008         struct cfs_hash_bd        old_bds[2];
02009         struct cfs_hash_bd        new_bd;
02010 
02011         LASSERT(!hlist_unhashed(hnode));
02012 
02013         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
02014 
02015         cfs_hash_dual_bd_get(hs, old_key, old_bds);
02016         cfs_hash_bd_get(hs, new_key, &new_bd);
02017 
02018         bds[0] = old_bds[0];
02019         bds[1] = old_bds[1];
02020         bds[2] = new_bd;
02021 
02022         /* NB: bds[0] and bds[1] are ordered already */
02023         cfs_hash_bd_order(&bds[1], &bds[2]);
02024         cfs_hash_bd_order(&bds[0], &bds[1]);
02025 
02026         cfs_hash_multi_bd_lock(hs, bds, 3, 1);
02027         if (likely(old_bds[1].bd_bucket == NULL)) {
02028                 cfs_hash_bd_move_locked(hs, &old_bds[0], &new_bd, hnode);
02029         } else {
02030                 cfs_hash_dual_bd_finddel_locked(hs, old_bds, old_key, hnode);
02031                 cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(hs, &new_bd, hnode);
02032         }
02033         /* overwrite key inside locks, otherwise may screw up with
02034          * other operations, i.e: rehash */
02035         cfs_hash_keycpy(hs, hnode, new_key);
02036 
02037         cfs_hash_multi_bd_unlock(hs, bds, 3, 1);
02038         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
02039 }
02040 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_rehash_key);
02041 
02042 void cfs_hash_debug_header(struct seq_file *m)
02043 {
02044         seq_printf(m, "%-*s   cur   min   max theta t-min t-max flags rehash   count  maxdep maxdepb distribution\n",
02045                    CFS_HASH_BIGNAME_LEN, "name");
02046 }
02047 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_debug_header);
02048 
02049 static struct cfs_hash_bucket **
02050 cfs_hash_full_bkts(struct cfs_hash *hs)
02051 {
02052         /* NB: caller should hold hs->hs_rwlock if REHASH is set */
02053         if (hs->hs_rehash_buckets == NULL)
02054                 return hs->hs_buckets;
02055 
02056         LASSERT(hs->hs_rehash_bits != 0);
02057         return hs->hs_rehash_bits > hs->hs_cur_bits ?
02058                hs->hs_rehash_buckets : hs->hs_buckets;
02059 }
02060 
02061 static unsigned int
02062 cfs_hash_full_nbkt(struct cfs_hash *hs)
02063 {
02064         /* NB: caller should hold hs->hs_rwlock if REHASH is set */
02065         if (hs->hs_rehash_buckets == NULL)
02066                 return CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs);
02067 
02068         LASSERT(hs->hs_rehash_bits != 0);
02069         return hs->hs_rehash_bits > hs->hs_cur_bits ?
02070                CFS_HASH_RH_NBKT(hs) : CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs);
02071 }
02072 
02073 void cfs_hash_debug_str(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct seq_file *m)
02074 {
02075         int dist[8] = { 0, };
02076         int maxdep = -1;
02077         int maxdepb = -1;
02078         int total = 0;
02079         int theta;
02080         int i;
02081 
02082         cfs_hash_lock(hs, 0);
02083         theta = __cfs_hash_theta(hs);
02084 
02085         seq_printf(m, "%-*s %5d %5d %5d %d.%03d %d.%03d %d.%03d  0x%02x %6d ",
02086                    CFS_HASH_BIGNAME_LEN, hs->hs_name,
02087                    1 << hs->hs_cur_bits, 1 << hs->hs_min_bits,
02088                    1 << hs->hs_max_bits,
02089                    __cfs_hash_theta_int(theta), __cfs_hash_theta_frac(theta),
02090                    __cfs_hash_theta_int(hs->hs_min_theta),
02091                    __cfs_hash_theta_frac(hs->hs_min_theta),
02092                    __cfs_hash_theta_int(hs->hs_max_theta),
02093                    __cfs_hash_theta_frac(hs->hs_max_theta),
02094                    hs->hs_flags, hs->hs_rehash_count);
02095 
02096         /*
02097          * The distribution is a summary of the chained hash depth in
02098          * each of the libcfs hash buckets.  Each buckets hsb_count is
02099          * divided by the hash theta value and used to generate a
02100          * histogram of the hash distribution.  A uniform hash will
02101          * result in all hash buckets being close to the average thus
02102          * only the first few entries in the histogram will be non-zero.
02103          * If you hash function results in a non-uniform hash the will
02104          * be observable by outlier bucks in the distribution histogram.
02105          *
02106          * Uniform hash distribution:           128/128/0/0/0/0/0/0
02107          * Non-Uniform hash distribution:       128/125/0/0/0/0/2/1
02108          */
02109         for (i = 0; i < cfs_hash_full_nbkt(hs); i++) {
02110                 struct cfs_hash_bd bd;
02111 
02112                 bd.bd_bucket = cfs_hash_full_bkts(hs)[i];
02113                 cfs_hash_bd_lock(hs, &bd, 0);
02114                 if (maxdep < bd.bd_bucket->hsb_depmax) {
02115                         maxdep  = bd.bd_bucket->hsb_depmax;
02116                         maxdepb = ffz(~maxdep);
02117                 }
02118                 total += bd.bd_bucket->hsb_count;
02119                 dist[min(fls(bd.bd_bucket->hsb_count / max(theta, 1)), 7)]++;
02120                 cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, 0);
02121         }
02122 
02123         seq_printf(m, "%7d %7d %7d ", total, maxdep, maxdepb);
02124         for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
02125                 seq_printf(m, "%d%c",  dist[i], (i == 7) ? '\n' : '/');
02126 
02127         cfs_hash_unlock(hs, 0);
02128 }
02129 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_hash_debug_str);
